_header: Thou rich man that sits on dais
Note: For the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 360.
_description: Gospel for First Sunday after Trinity, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
ÞOw riche mon þat sittest on desAnd makest þi bodi
                    wel at es…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And þider wiþ hem vs alle lede heAmen Amen par
                    Charite
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodAsh42.First Lines:
þou riche man þat sittis on deesAnd mase þi bodi
                    wele atees…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…þou riche god vs þidir ledeþare pure men sall
                    haue þaire mede . Amen .
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
Þou riche man þat sittes on deseAnd maked þi body
                    wele at ese…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…And til þat blisse vs alle lede heAmen Amen par
                    charite
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Dominica prima post festum trinitatis secundum Lucam (p.
                    220)

CULDd11.First Lines:
Thow riche man þat sittest on des& makist þi bodi wel
                    at ese…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…& thedir with hem vs alle lede heAmen Amen pur
                    Charite
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Dominica prima post festum sancte trinitatis Euangelium secundum
                        Lucam (f. 136v)

CULGg531.First Lines:
þou ryche man þat syttes on dessAnd mase þi body
                    wele at ess…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…And þider with þaim vs all ledeAnd grant vs heuen
                    vntill oure mede
CULGg531.Attributed Title:
þe exposicion of þis gospell sall þou fynd be fore on
                    þe sonunday next efter halowthursday; Þe gospell of þe first
                    sonunday affter þe trinite sonunday (f. 92v)

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
ÞOw riche mon þat sitest on desAnd makest þi bodi
                    wel at es…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…And þider with hem vs alle lede heAmen Ame[sic] par
                    charite
BLAdd22283.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library MS Add. 22283 (‘Simeon’).
         2014; http://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Add_MS_22283.

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Þou riche man þat sittes on deseAnd mase þai body
                    well at ese…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Thou riche gode vs þider ledeThair pure man shall haue
                    þair mede. Amen.

HunHM129.First Lines:
Þow ryche man þat sittys on deseAnd makyst þi body
                    well at ese…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…And þeddyr with ham vs all lede beAmen amen all say
                    we

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Tþou Ryche man þat syttys one deseAnd mase þi body
                    wele at ese…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…and þider wyth vs lede heAmen say we all par
                    charite
MinULZ822.Attributed Title:
Dominica prima post festum sancti trinitatis Secundum Lucam (f.
                        101v)
